text: Mannheim ARENA/Maimarkt station () is a railway station in the municipality of Mannheim, located in Baden-Württemberg, Germany. ==Notable places nearby== *Maimarktgelände *Mannheim City Airport *Mannheim May Market *SAP Arena ==References== Category:Railway stations in Mannheim Category:Buildings and structures in Mannheim
title: Mannheim ARENA/Maimarkt station
